attributes.description: Exclusive Autos is a reputable dealer with over 20 years experience in motor retail and sold more than 40000 vehicles We offer you in excess of 200 Quality approved used vehicles All vehicles undergo a mechanical multipoint check and get issued a roadworthy certificate upon delivery. We do assist with finance and deliver countrywide to make your experience as effortless as possible. All tradeins accepted, and we GUARANTEE to beat any written offer with R10000 Mechanical warranties and service plans also available for your peace of mind. Price excludes Administration, Delivery Registration costs. Become part of the Exclusive Autos family. EOE

attributes.description: Extended Factory Service Plan until 29/11/2026 or 121000km Premium Maintenance Plan until 29/11/2024 or 101000km Warranty until 23/11/2023 or 120 000km complimentary service plan until 29/11/2025 or 91500km At AutoCity Group we understand how important buying a vehicle is for our customers. attributes.description: The BMW X3 is a statement of unlimited opportunities and an expression of sheer presence and freedom. From the very first glance, it impresses with its athletic appearance and fascinates with an exciting driving experience. Thanks to partially autonomous driving and the intelligent all-wheel drive system BMW xDrive, it offers supreme ride comfort both on and off the road. It therefore redefines the benchmarks in its class and makes one thing unmistakably clear: there is a great difference in how you reach your destinations.
